name: Lemon Rosemary Salmon
author: CHEDDAR97005
summary: This is the perfect romantic dinner for two when served with an Oregon Pinot Noir, crusty bread, wild rice, and salad.
ingredients: 2  salmon fillets, bones and skin removed
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Arrange half the lemon slices in a single layer in a baking dish
Layer with 2 sprigs rosemary, and top with salmon fillets
Sprinkle salmon with salt, layer with remaining rosemary sprigs, and top with remaining lemon slices
Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until fish is easily flaked with a fork
